name: chat-output-renderer-sample
description: Sample chat output renderer extension that renders Mermaid diagrams.

languageModelTools.name: extSample_renderMermaidDiagram
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Renders a Mermaid diagram from Mermaid.js markup.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Render a Mermaid.js diagrams from markup.

markup.description: The mermaid diagram markup to render as a Mermaid diagram. This should only be the markup of the diagram. Do not include a wrapping code block.

languageModelTools.name: extSample_createMermaidDiagram
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Creates a Mermaid diagram from a description and renders for the user.

description.description: A plain text description of the Mermaid diagram to create. The description should be detailed enough for the model to generate a valid Mermaid diagram markup.
